title: Exploring Techniques for Detecting GAN-Generated Images
description: RGB image channels are individually transformed using Fast Fourier Transform (FFT), then shifted to center and normalized. Transformed channels replace original ones, and images are fed into a deep network for classification

title: Diabetic Retinopathy detection and Heart disease Prediction
description: Implemented CNN, to achieve an accuracy of 95.6% in detecting Diabetic Retinopathy.

title: Steel Defect Detection and Classification
description: Provided an effective and robust approach to detect metal defects using Semantic Segmentation (UNet architecture) and classify the same using CNN, and created web application for the same using FLASK API
